name: Moving On (Bolt Jam 6)
description:
This Game is Best Enjoyed with Audio! <3

Curious about the Bolt behind the game? Checkout these two links:

https://youtu.be/TB4c3y1PcC8

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FoZneCy69q8

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Space Bar to Turn on the Light in the Dark....

GamePlay

Help our young friend find his way in the dark and defeat the things that haunt him. Be careful how much you try to use the light though as it invites back in those that haunt you.

In this scary puzzle game try to Move on from the past without allowing the evil to Move while the lights are On.
